attributes.action: Review the negative consequences of the scope of extended CRB checks on volunteers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Repeal (if it is to become law) that  volunteer social involvement with any group does not incur unnecessary crb (indirect tax) checks.
This will discourage both monetarily and ,more importantly, morally those who willing give their time to support the community.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
